Original: 應有盡有的一家店，調酒爲其主要特色，老闆每天去市場購買新鮮水果與材料，以維持店裡每杯調酒的品質，除了menu上的調酒外，還隱藏了許多的特調，如果想喝menu外的調酒，吧台會為您量身打造一杯屬於你的特調，非常適合男女一起來放鬆小酌，對於喜歡喝威士忌的老饕，店裡也不乏威士忌，不論是艾雷島、高地區的、斯貝賽、日本的，在此因有盡有，一個人來也可以享受一趟威士忌之旅，對於喜歡喝啤酒的朋友，老闆也精心挑選了兩款台灣的精釀品牌，藍白拖的荔枝與草莓啤酒，與福爾摩沙的二重奏、三劍客、流動饗宴，此外還有大家最喜歡的18天生啤，台北市能找的到有18天生啤現拉的真的很難，就算你一個人來，吧台也會親切的跟你聊個天，所以非常適合獨自或攜朋引伴一起來
EN: There is a store that is available, and the bartending is its main feature. The boss go to the market to buy fresh fruits and materials every day to maintain the quality of each cup of bartender in the store. In addition to the bartender on the MENU If you want to drink Menu's bartender, the bar will tailor you for your special tune. It is very suitable for men and women to relax and drink together. For old ladies who like to drink whiskey, there are no shortage of whiskeys in the store. Whether it is Ere Island , High -regional, Sibeis, and Japan, there are everything here. You can also enjoy a trip to whiskey. For friends who like to drink beer, the boss has carefully selected two craft brands in Taiwan. The blue -white dragging litchi and strawberry beer, the dual play, the three swordsman, and the mobile feast of Formosa, in addition, there are everyone's favorite 18th birth beer. It's difficult. Even if you come alone, the bar will talk to you kindly, so it is very suitable for you alone or bring your friends with your friends.

Original: 我在台北最喜歡的低調酒吧之一，原因如下：它很舒適，看起來很棒，裡面禁止吸煙（不過你可以在外面吸煙），音樂更適合電子、浩室和電子音樂愛好者，但不要太大聲，這樣人們就可以聊天。飲料非常有創意，但不做作，但總是裝在合適的玻璃杯中，並採用新鮮的原料製成。價格公平，工作人員總是願意取悅您。這裡也毗鄰其他 3-4 間酒吧/俱樂部，因此是開啟美好夜晚的理想場所。
EN: One of my favorite low -key bars in Taipei, the reason is as follows: it is very comfortable and looks great. It is prohibited from smoking (but you can smoke outside). Music is more suitable for electronic, Haoyayo and electronic music lovers, but don't want to do not want to Too loud, so people can chat.Drinks are very creative, but they are not pretentious, but they are always installed in the appropriate glass and made of fresh raw materials.Fair prices, staff are always willing to please you.It is also adjacent to the other 3-4 bars/clubs, so it is an ideal place to start a beautiful night.

Original: 氣氛非常舒適，飲料價格非常高，這意味著我們喝醉了然後在那裡過夜太貴了。小杯台生酒200元，商店裡30元，其他酒吧120-150元。真是恥辱。如果飲料價格實惠，我會成為這裡的常客，因為那裡的氛圍和可愛的人們，但我並不富有，不想喝一瓶啤酒一個小時，而且真的不喜歡“我知道我被多收費了”的感覺」。畢竟，這是一個學生風格的酒吧，而不是我的客廳，而不是 W 酒店。
EN: The atmosphere is very comfortable, the price of drinks is very high, which means that we are drunk and then spend the night too expensive.Small cups of wine 200 yuan, 30 yuan in the store, and 120-150 yuan in other bars.It's a shame.If the price of beverages is affordable, I will become a frequent visitor here, because the atmosphere and cute people there, but I am not rich, I don’t want to drink a bottle of beer for an hour, and I really don’t like "I know I have been charged more". Feel".After all, this is a student -style bar, not my living room, not W Hotel.
